title: 820-00045 would only charge in one direction
message: hello guys have a 820-00045 that would only charge in one direction but not the other way round.

title: 820-00045 would only charge in one direction
message: The board works in the reverse, and charges as well...but then when you plug in a usb drive, it says usb disabled, device is using too much power " also , plugging in a usb device will bring a charging icon on the battery but not actually charging it ... But with a charger, it would charge fine in one direction and not even detect the charger in the other direction

title: 820-00045 would only charge in one direction
message: [USER="682"]2informaticos[/USER] thank you guys,@JohnB8812.. I found a partial short on E8_CC2 through U4700.. and now art works both ways
